plot: Two bumbling crooks, the little one with brains, the big one with brawn, have an existential crisis while they try to knock over a diner.
title: Dick and Bob
plot_es: Two bumbling crooks, the little one with brains, the big one with brawn, have an existential crisis while they try to knock over a diner.
plot_en: Two bumbling crooks, the little one with brains, the big one with brawn, have an existential crisis while they try to knock over a diner.
